TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi ContentPresenter extends System.Windows.FrameworkElement

summary.span: 显示 的内容。

span.span: Displays the content of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常使用中的指定其中的内容是要添加。You typically use the in the of a to specify where the content is to be added. 每个类型具有其默认情况下。Every type has a in its default . 当对象处于的、 ， ，和属性获得它们的值的相同名称的属性从。When a object is in a of a , the , , and properties get their values from the properties of the same names of the . 你可以属性可获取其他属性的模板化父级通过设置这些属性的值属性或绑定到它们。You can have the property get the values of these properties from other properties of the templated parent by setting the property or binding to them. 使用以下逻辑来显示:The uses the following logic to display the : - 如果属性设置，适用的到属性以及产生及其子元素，如果有的话，会显示。If the property on the is set, the applies that to the property and the resulting and its child elements, if any, are displayed. 有关详细信息对象，请参阅[数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information about objects, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). - 如果属性设置，适用相应到属性以及产生及其子元素，如果有的话，会显示。If the property on the is set, the applies the appropriate to the property and the resulting and its child elements, if any, are displayed. - 如果没有的一种与关联、适用的到属性以及产生和及其子元素，如果有的话，将显示。If there is a associated with the type of , the applies that to the property and the resulting and its child elements, if any, are displayed. - 如果是对象，显示。If is a object, the is displayed. 如果已经有父级，则会发生异常。If the already has a parent, an exception occurs. - 如果没有，用于将转换的类型到、将使用该以及产生显示。If there is a that converts the type of to a , the uses that and the resulting is displayed. - 如果没有，用于将转换的类型为一个字符串，将使用该并创建以包含该字符串。If there is a that converts the type of to a string, the uses that and creates a to contain that string. 此时将显示。The is displayed. - 如果内容是的值属性显示在。If the content is an , the value of the property is displayed in a . - 调用方法并创建以包含返回的字符串。The calls the method on the and creates a to contain the string returned by . 此时将显示。The is displayed. ## Examples 如下所示设置的。The following shows a that sets the of a . 定义显示为内元素。The defines that the appears as an within a element. 标记，的应该显示和垂直和水平内居中。The marks that the of the should be displayed and centered vertically and horizontally within the . [!code-xaml[StylingIntroSample_snippet#ButtonCT](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylingIntroSample_snippet/CSharp/Window1.xaml#buttonct)] 下图显示的外观这获取应用时：The following image shows the appearance of the when this gets applied: ![按钮 ControlTemplate 示例](~/add/media/stylingintro-buttoncontroltemplate.png "按钮 ControlTemplate 示例")![Button ControlTemplate sample](~/add/media/stylingintro-buttoncontroltemplate.png "Button ControlTemplate sample")

summary.span: 返回要使用的模板。

span.span: Returns the template to use.

summary.span: 这可能取决于内容或其他属性。

span.span: This may depend on the content or other properties.
The to use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基类实现以下规则：The base class implements the following rules: 1. 如果设置，则使用它。If is set, use it. 2. 如果设置时，调用其方法。If is set, call its method. 如果结果不为`null`，使用它。If the result is not `null`, use it. 3. 查找其已知的资源之间内容匹配（包括应用程序、 主题和系统资源）。Look for a whose matches the content among the resources known to the (including application, theme, and system resources). 如果找到一个对象，使用它。If one is found, use it. 4. 如果的一种是"common"，使用标准模板。If the type of is "common", use a standard template. 常见类型如下`String`， ，和。The common types are `String`, , and . 5. 否则，请使用的默认模板，实质上是将转换为字符串并将其显示在。Otherwise, use a default template that essentially converts to a string and displays it in a . 派生的类可以重写这些规则并实现其自己。Derived classes can override these rules and implement their own.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你将放置中的，它会自动显示的模板化控件。When you place a in the of a , it automatically displays the of the templated control. 这意味着，如果你设置的你要、属性隐式绑定到的，正在使用且。This means that if you set the of your to be , the property of the is implicitly bound to the of the that is using that . 若要将设置绑定属性，你可能需要考虑使用属性。To set up bindings for the properties, you may want to consider using the property. 属性指向上模板化父级以及别名的属性关联的模板和模板选择器属性自动。The property points to a property on the templated parent as well as aliases the associated template and template selector properties automatically. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 通常情况下，使用`TemplateBinding`将此属性的值绑定上模板化控件的值。Typically, you use `TemplateBinding` to bind this property value to a value on templated control. 有关[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]信息，请参阅[TemplateBinding 标记扩展](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

summary.span: 获取或设置要在自动命名别名过程中使用的基名称。

value.span: 要在自动命名别名过程中使用的基名称。

span.span: The base name to use during automatic aliasing.
The default is "Content".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只应为此属性时使用模板中。This property should only be used when the is in a template. 如果模板包含与设置为"`Abc`"，则， ，和属性会自动化名为`Abc`， `AbcTemplate`，和`AbcTemplateSelector`分别。When a template contains a with set to "`Abc`", the , , and properties of the are automatically aliased to `Abc`, `AbcTemplate`, and `AbcTemplateSelector`, respectively. 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_long](~/includes/net-v35sp1-long-md.md)]，则设置到"`Abc`"也会导致属性化名为`AbcStringFormat`。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v35SP1_long](~/includes/net-v35sp1-long-md.md)], setting to "`Abc`" also causes the property to be aliased to `AbcStringFormat`. 此属性的两个最有用值为"内容"和"标头"。The two most useful values for this property are "Content" and "Header". ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示的样式，演示如何使用属性：The following example shows a style for a that demonstrates the usage of the property: [!code-xaml[HeaderedContentControl#HeaderedContentControlStyle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headeredcontentcontrolstyle)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以是预定义、 撰写的或自定义字符串格式。 can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format. 有关字符串格式的详细信息，请参阅[格式化类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 如果你设置或属性、忽略属性。If you set the or property of a , the property is ignored. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为**true**Metadata properties set to **true**|无None|
